name: Icy Revenge Upon the Fantasy Maiden
name_original: Icy Revenge Upon the Fantasy Maiden
description:
Cirno had her wings and dignity stolen by the hakurei shrine maiden! Will she be able to restore justice in Gensokyo and take back what belongs to her?

join her on her quest to find out!

This game plays like the classic legend of Zelda game, but with an icy twist!

Game by:

-White Pikmin
-Chained_Tan / Dedalocious
-Bobston

thank you for playing!
